src.groovy.org.grails.jaxrs.support
Class DomainObjectReaderSupport

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.org.grails.jaxrs.support.DomainObjectReaderSupport

class DomainObjectReaderSupport

A message body reader that converts an XML or JSON entity streams to a domain object. The request content type must be specified by the Content-Type HTTP header. Supported content types by this provider are text/xml, application/xml, text/x-json or application/json. Assuming Note is a Grails domain class. This provider supports usage of resource methods such as: 

 @Path('/notes')
 class NotesResource {
 
      @POST
      @Consumes(['application/xml','application/json'])
      Response addNote(Note note) {
          note.save()
          // ...
      }
      
 }
author:
Martin Krasser

protected boolean isEnabled()

Returns true if type is a Grails domain class and the request content type is one of text/xml, application/xml, text/x-json or application/json.

Creates a Grails domain object from an XML or JSON request entity stream.

Method Detail

isEnabled

protected boolean isEnabled()
If false this reader will be skipped. Returns true by default.

isReadable

boolean isReadable(java.lang.Class type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType)
Returns true if type is a Grails domain class and the request content type is one of text/xml, application/xml, text/x-json or application/json. If isEnabled() returns false this method will always return false.

readFrom

java.lang.Object readFrom(java.lang.Class type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType, MultivaluedMap httpHeaders, java.io.InputStream entityStream)
Creates a Grails domain object from an XML or JSON request entity stream.
